title: Bram Stoker's Notes and Research for Dracula Secrets of the Dead
text: Pop culture has fixated on vampires, thrilling audiences with the horror of a deadly monsterâ€¦ A nocturnal predator from Eastern Europe who rises from the grave to feed off the blood of its victims. But what if Dracula, and all the other vampires that have captured the public imagination, have a basis in reality?
